Comment.Language: For the fourth week of the month of Koiahk:

Text.Language: Elicabet acmici n~ous/ri: acmou] e~ pefran je Iwann/c: Za,ariac piou/b: afouwn n~rwf efhwc e~V].
Elizabeth gave birth to a son, and called his name John, Zacharias the priest, opened his mouth praising God.
اليصابات ولدتإبن ، ودعت إسمه يوحنا ، زكريا الكاهن ، فتح فاه مسبحً الله.
Mpe ouon twnf qen nijinmici: n~te nihio~mi efo~ni m~mok: n~yok ounis] qen n/eyouab t/rou: Iwann/c piref]wmc.
Among those born of women, no one is like you, you are great among all the saints, O John the Baptist.
لم يقم في مواليد النساء ، من يشبهك ، أنت عظيم في جميع القديسين ، يا يوحنا المعمدان.
